Reference is made to the above heading.
Gold Seal Medical College is a fully registered and accredited Private Health institution located in Singida Region, Tanzania. Its NACTVET registration number is; REG/HAS/224. It offers two programs namely Diploma in Pharmaceutical Sciences and Diploma in Clinical Medicine.
Following the NACTVET curricula that require students to participate in both theoretical and practical training, we humbly request you to kindly permit our students of NTA level 4, 5 and 6 to undertake their practical training at your hospital for a period of four (4) weeks from 20th May, 2024 to 14th June, 2024. Areas of training will include: Medical store, OPD pharmacy, NHIF pharmacy, TB and CTC. In the course of this Period, their supervisors will pass by to evaluate their progress.
List of students is attached with this letter 
Thank you for your cooperation.

Subject: Request for Practical Training Placement at Your Hospital

Dear [Recipient's Name],

I am writing on behalf of Gold Seal Medical College, a distinguished health institution located in the Singida Region, Tanzania. Our college is fully registered and accredited by NACTVET with registration number REG/HAS/224, and we pride ourselves on offering comprehensive programs in Pharmaceutical Sciences and Clinical Medicine leading to diplomas.

As per the NACTVET curriculum, which mandates both theoretical learning and practical training for a well-rounded educational experience, we are seeking your esteemed cooperation to facilitate a practical training opportunity for our students. We respectfully request permission for our students at NTA levels 4, 5, and 6 to undertake their practical training at your prestigious hospital. The proposed training period is from May 20, 2024, to June 14, 2024, spanning four weeks.

The practical training aims to provide students with hands-on experience in various departments including the Medical Store, OPD Pharmacy, NHIF Pharmacy, as well as TB and CTC units. This exposure is critical for their skill development and professional growth. Additionally, during this training period, faculty supervisors will conduct periodic visits to assess the students' progress and ensure the training aligns with our academic standards and objectives.

Enclosed with this letter, you will find a list of the students proposed for this training placement. We believe that this practical experience will be mutually beneficial, contributing to the professional readiness of our students and offering your hospital additional support in the respective departments.

We appreciate your consideration of our request and look forward to the opportunity to collaborate with your facility. Your support in nurturing the next generation of healthcare professionals is invaluable.

Thank you for your cooperation and assistance.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]
Gold Seal Medical College
[Contact Information]

Rewrite the following:

We pride ourselves on offering comprehensive programs in Pharmaceutical Sciences, Medical Laboratory and Clinical Medicine leading to diplomas.
We take great pride in providing extensive educational programs in Pharmaceutical Sciences, Medical Laboratory, and Clinical Medicine, all of which culminate in diploma qualifications.
Rewrite the following: We offer two programs namely Diploma in Pharmaceutical Sciences and Diploma in Clinical Medicine.
We provide two distinguished programs: a Diploma in Pharmaceutical Sciences and a Diploma in Clinical Medicine.
